strapiPost.title: Everyone is Losing Their Head Over the New Hit Musical SIX at Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
From Tudor queens to pop icons, the SIX wives of Henry VIII take the microphone to remix 500 years of historical heartbreak into a euphoric celebration of 21st-century girl power! On stage at Walton Arts Center from Sep 12-17.

Divorced, Beheaded, Died: This new original musical is the global sensation everyone is losing their head over. SIX won 23 awards in the 2021/22 Broadway season, including the Tony for Best Original Score and the Outer Critics Circle Award for Best Musical.

Divorced, Beheaded, Survived: See SIX live at Walton Arts Center from Sep 12-17, with the best available seating on Thursday, Sep 14, at 1:30p and 7p. Shake things up with a preshow cocktail class on Thursday, Friday, or Saturday evening â€” cocktail classes are $39 and include two drinks & light appetizers.

Reserve tickets for SIX and select add-ons HERE.
